arts.ttl: Lecce Explores Sensational Move for Marcelo: Initial Inquiry Made
arts.sum: In a stunning development, reports suggest that Brazilian football legend Marcelo is eyeing a return to the pitch and has set his sights on Serie A for potentially his last major European adventure. The 36-year-old former Real Madrid star, who recently ended his stint with Fluminense in November, is reportedly keen on experiencing Italian football for the first time in his illustrious career. The post Lecce Explores Sensational Move for Marcelo: Initial Inquiry Made appeared first on FootItalia.com.
